title: DAMP
authors: Yue Lu, Renjie Wu, Abdullah Mueen, Maria A. Zuluaga, Eamonn Keogh

parameters.name: n_init_train
parameters.description: Fraction of data used to warmup streaming.

parameters.name: max_lag
parameters.description: Maximum size to look back in time.

parameters.name: lookahead
parameters.description: Amount of steps to look into the future for deciding which future windows to skip analyzing.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator
